results.title: My newborn (2 weeks old) refuses to breast feed and it is breaking ...

results.title: AGGRESSION - Why children lash out and what to do
results.explanation: While the original text focuses more on emotional regulation techniques and the psychology behind aggressive behavior, this extract shares similar insights about the importance of empathy, quality time, play, and laughter in resolving aggression, as well as addressing the need to avoid shaming or scolding the child.
